name: Command Interpreter Malicious Script Response Playbook
description: This playbook outlines the steps to mitigate an incident involving the execution of malicious scripts through a command interpreter leading to unauthorized access and potential data exfiltration.

parallel--e2eab3a2-f5d1-49d8-888e-54baca.name: Execute Initial Mitigations
parallel--e2eab3a2-f5d1-49d8-888e-54baca.description: Initiate critical response steps for the malicious script execution incident.

action--f3337a8c-1b55-4e18-a63e-020f0d29.name: Kill malicious process
action--f3337a8c-1b55-4e18-a63e-020f0d29.description: Terminate any processes associated with the malicious script.

action--e6cd2900-7b7f-4c45-8a5f-efc2d932.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--e6cd2900-7b7f-4c45-8a5f-efc2d932.description: Disconnect the compromised host from the network to prevent further data exfiltration.

action--bb7f3fe1-3c47-42a0-b4c3-877b103f.name: Conduct system-wide malware scan
action--bb7f3fe1-3c47-42a0-b4c3-877b103f.description: Perform malware scanning until the scan completes successfully.

action--b00d1bef-c8a9-47b5-97f2-0e1c167c.name: Review logs for suspicious activity
action--b00d1bef-c8a9-47b5-97f2-0e1c167c.description: Analyze logs to identify any unauthorized actions related to the malicious script.

action--8a1b72b0-b26b-4c22-a6a1-bc4c608a.name: Update firewall rules to block malicious IPs
action--8a1b72b0-b26b-4c22-a6a1-bc4c608a.description: Modify firewall settings to block any IPs associated with the attack.
